mapper.select: SELECT a.channel channelNo, a.mac, a.`session`, ( unix_timestamp(MAX(a.timestamp)) - unix_timestamp(MIN(a.timestamp)) ) * 10 totalTop, unix_timestamp(MIN(a.timestamp)) begin , unix_timestamp(MAX(a.timestamp)) end, b.district_id districtId, b.block_id blockId, b.residence_id residenceId, count(a.mac) pv FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a INNER JOIN statistics.mac_info b ON a.mac = b.mac WHERE a.`timestamp` >= #{startTime} AND a.`timestamp` <= #{endTime} GROUP BY a.mac, a.channel, a.`session`
SELECT COUNT(*) count, unix_timestamp(#{startTime}) spanTime FROM statistics.api_logs_shfctv a WHERE a.`timestamp` < #{startTime} AND a.`session` = #{session}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO statistics.channel_visit_summary ( district_id, block_id, residence_id, channel_no, mac, pv, begin_time, end_time, total_top ) VALUES (#{logGenerator.districtId}, #{logGenerator.blockId}, #{logGenerator.residenceId}, #{logGenerator.channelNo}, #{logGenerator.mac}, #{logGenerator.pv}, #{logGenerator.beginTime}, #{logGenerator.endTime}, #{logGenerator.totalTop})
